languages.text: "Был на Летусе один парень, доперечислялся до сбоя в импланте. Некоторые глухи к урокам мудрости!"

traits.locale_text: "Был на Летусе один парень, доперечислялся до сбоя в импланте. Некоторые глухи к урокам мудрости!"

languages.text: "You know, there was a guy on Leethus who also liked listing things until it fried his implant. Alas, some people are deaf to lessons of wisdom!"
languages.original_text: "Был на Летусе один парень, доперечислялся до сбоя в импланте. Некоторые глухи к урокам мудрости!"

traits.locale_text: "You know, there was a guy on Leethus who also liked listing things until it fried his implant. Alas, some people are deaf to lessons of wisdom!"
"You know, there was a guy on Leethus who also liked listing things until it fried his implant. Alas, some people are deaf to lessons of wisdom!"
"You know, there was a guy on Leethus who also liked listing things until it fried his implant. Alas, some people are deaf to lessons of wisdom!"
"You know, there was a guy on Leethus who also liked listing things until it fried his implant. Alas, some people are deaf to lessons of wisdom!"
"You know, there was a guy on Leethus who also liked listing things until it fried his implant. Alas, some people are deaf to lessons of wisdom!"
"You know, there was a guy on Leethus who also liked listing things until it fried his implant. Alas, some people are deaf to lessons of wisdom!"

languages.text: 「そういえば、リーザスにも物を延々と列挙するのが好きな奴がいたわ。インプラントが焼き切れるまでやってたっけ。まったく、賢者の教えに耳を貸さない人って、どこにでもいるのね！」
languages.original_text: "You know, there was a guy on Leethus who also liked listing things until it fried his implant. Alas, some people are deaf to lessons of wisdom!"

traits.locale_text: 「そういえば、リーザスにも物を延々と列挙するのが好きな奴がいたわ。インプラントが焼き切れるまでやってたっけ。まったく、賢者の教えに耳を貸さない人って、どこにでもいるのね！」

languages.text: "Wisst Ihr, auf Leethus gab es einen Burschen, der auch gerne Dinge aufgelistet hat, bis dadurch sein Implantat durchgebrannt ist. Tja, aber manche Leute sind eben immun gegen Lektionen der Weisheit!"
languages.original_text: "You know, there was a guy on Leethus who also liked listing things until it fried his implant. Alas, some people are deaf to lessons of wisdom!"

traits.locale_text: "Wisst Ihr, auf Leethus gab es einen Burschen, der auch gerne Dinge aufgelistet hat, bis dadurch sein Implantat durchgebrannt ist. Tja, aber manche Leute sind eben immun gegen Lektionen der Weisheit!"

languages.text: « Vous savez, il y avait un type sur Leethus qui adorait lister des choses, lui aussi, jusqu'à ce que ça grille son implant. Malheureusement, certaines personnes sont incapables de retenir la leçon ! »
languages.original_text: "You know, there was a guy on Leethus who also liked listing things until it fried his implant. Alas, some people are deaf to lessons of wisdom!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous savez, il y avait un type sur Leethus qui adorait lister des choses, lui aussi, jusqu'à ce que ça grille son implant. Malheureusement, certaines personnes sont incapables de retenir la leçon ! »

languages.text: «¿Sabe? En Leethus había un tipo al que también le gustaba enumerar cosas, hasta que se le frió el implante. ¡Pero algunas personas no aprenden en cabeza ajena!».
languages.original_text: "You know, there was a guy on Leethus who also liked listing things until it fried his implant. Alas, some people are deaf to lessons of wisdom!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Sabe? En Leethus había un tipo al que también le gustaba enumerar cosas, hasta que se le frió el implante. ¡Pero algunas personas no aprenden en cabeza ajena!».

languages.text: “说真的，利瑟斯上也有个家伙喜欢把所有东西都列出来，后来他的植入物烧坏了。遗憾的是，有些人就是不肯吸取教训！”
languages.original_text: "You know, there was a guy on Leethus who also liked listing things until it fried his implant. Alas, some people are deaf to lessons of wisdom!"

traits.locale_text: “说真的，利瑟斯上也有个家伙喜欢把所有东西都列出来，后来他的植入物烧坏了。遗憾的是，有些人就是不肯吸取教训！”

languages.text: "Leethus'ta aynı böyle devamlı bir şeyler sayıp implantını yakan biri vardı. Kimisinin bir kulağından girip diğerinden çıkıyor, çok yazık!"
languages.original_text: "You know, there was a guy on Leethus who also liked listing things until it fried his implant. Alas, some people are deaf to lessons of wisdom!"

traits.locale_text: "Leethus'ta aynı böyle devamlı bir şeyler sayıp implantını yakan biri vardı. Bazılarının bir kulağından girip diğerinden çıkıyor, çok yazık!"

languages.original_text: "You know, there was a guy on Leethus who also liked listing things until it fried his implant. Alas, some people are deaf to lessons of wisdom!"
